name: Valentinos
description: The Valentinos are a gang operating in Night City. During the 2070s, the Valentinos were based out of Heywood in central Night City. They were one of the largest gangs in the metropolis, with a membership of about 6,000 in 2077. Strictly territorial, they operated in the vast impoverished Latino barrios in the Glen, Vista del Rey, and Wellsprings, where they were strongly rooted in the local communities. They were representatives of the Chicano culture of Night City and had cultivated those...
